headline: Capital Power 2025 Investor Day: Accelerating Growth to 2030

headline: Here's How Much a $1000 Investment in Apollo Global Management Inc. Made 10 Years Ago Would Be Worth Today
summary: Investing in certain stocks can pay off in the long run, especially if you hold on for a decade or more.

headline: Private markets will be key to overcoming 60-40 headwinds in 2026
summary: As part of Yahoo Finance's exclusive coverage with executives at Apollo Global (APO), Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi sits down with Apollo Global Management Chief Client & Product Development Officer Stephanie Drescher to discuss the importance of building a winning portfolio through the inclusion of private market investments and why a higher-for-longer interest rate environment could be a headwind for the 60/40 portfolio construction in 2026. Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Private markets will be key to overcoming 60-40 headwinds in 2026
content.description:
As part of Yahoo Finance's exclusive coverage with executives at Apollo Global (APO), Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi sits down with Apollo Global Management Chief Client & Product Development Officer Stephanie Drescher to discuss the importance of building a winning portfolio through the inclusion of private market investments and why a higher-for-longer interest rate environment could be a headwind for the 60/40 portfolio construction in 2026.

Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
